WindowVrdisplayactivate_event.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The vrdisplayactivate event of the WebVR API is fired when a VR display is able to be presented to, for example if an HMD has been moved to bring it out of standby, or woken up by being put on.

blockquote.para: Note: This event was part of the old WebVR API. It has been superseded by the WebXR Device API.

remarks.para: This event is not cancelable and does not bubble.
